content: > for my throw sized blanket i used 11 skeins of stylecraft special dk in shades parchment meadow fondant sherbet aspen apricot candyfloss lavender aster lipstick and pale rose for the border it was a close call though so if you plan on making something larger than a throw i d definitely get two balls of each color but you could still just get 1 for the border color you can use any colors or indeed any kind of yarn that you would like begin by chaining any multiple of 24 i e 96 120 144 etc and don t chain too tightly then chain 2 more for our turning chains with my dk weight yarn and my h/8/5mm i chained 194 total to make my throw about 50 /127cm wide but you make yours however long you wish all instructions are on the website this project was begun as a crochet along project with about 8 row being introduced each week the inspiration for this blanket is the lovely blanket by julie at little woolie 1 and also this blanket by raveler tinaspice 2 1 http //www littlewoollie blogspot co uk/2011/10/mixed-stripey-blanket-end-tadah html 2 http //www ravelry com/projects/tinaspice/stripey-blanket-2
